Ingredients.1: 2  red bell peppers, halved and seeded

Ingredients.5: 1 (15 ounce) can cannellini beans, drained and rinsed

Ingredients.10: 1 salt and ground black pepper to taste

Directions.1: Place a steamer insert into a saucepan and fill with water to just below the bottom of the steamer. Bring water to a boil. Add red bell pepper halves, cover, and steam until just tender, 2 to 6 minutes.

Directions.2: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).

Directions.3: Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium heat. Cook tempeh and onion until tempeh is crispy, 5 to 10 minutes. Add cannellini beans, spinach, and broth; cook until heated through, about 5 minutes. Remove from heat. Stir feta cheese, nutritional yeast, salt, and pepper into stuffing.

Directions.4: Fill red bell pepper halves with stuffing. Place on a baking sheet.

Directions.5: Bake in the preheated oven, uncovered, until tops are browned, about 30 minutes.
